A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: In the past\, I had always looked at the Rotten Tomatoes score before going to see a movie. After seeing the hate for The Last Jedi\, I don’t think I will let that influence my moviegoing decisions going forward. I thoroughly enjoyed the movie both times I saw it. I have to believe that people are using bots to hurt the score of the movie. Don’t let fake reviews make decisions for you. While the movie is not perfect\, there is enough there to make it “must see”. It may even take a second viewing to get the whole picture of what all is going on. When I go to see a movie in theaters\, I want to be entertained and I was very much entertained. Don’t go expecting this or that to happen because you will just be disappointed if it doesn’t. There’s nothing wrong with thinking about possible outcomes\, but remember that it is good to be surprised when watching a movie. I feel that Rian Johnson did a great job with this movie and look forward to seeing what comes next in this trilogy. Some people hated that The Force Awakens was a rehash of A New Hope. Now people are hating that this one is different. It is also a bad thing to look for “hidden agendas”. Go to the movie with an open mind and you might be surprised.
